resources.string: UC Davis Belongs: You Belong Here

string.name: linkToSite
string.a: Visit the site for more info

resources.string:
Problem: 
 With over 30,000 undergraduate students at UC Davis, it can be difficult to fit in. There are so many people, and students easily feel like they are lost in the crowds.

 Solution: 
 An app, where students could read stories about previous students’ experiences​. (to present the experiences of current students, in written, audio, and video formats, to new students entering UC Davis)

 Goal: 
 Our goal was to create a convenient, effective, and stream-lined option to share the belonging stories with students.
